text: Lokendra Bahadur Chand (; born 15 February 1940) is a Nepali politician. He was the 27th Prime Minister of Nepal four times: from 1983 to 1986, briefly during April 1990, briefly during 1997, and from October 2002 until June 2003. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Nepal Category:Nepalese Hindus
title: Lokendra Bahadur Chand
